summary: This package is a large texture resource pack containing around 27 hand made textures all hi-res(4K,2K) with proper normal maps included. Nothing in these textures was taken from the internet, they were created purely out of my own personal Photoshop assets and some game assets in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This package is a large texture resource pack containing around 27 hand made textures all hi-res(4K,2K) with proper normal maps included. Most of these are stone based textures because I am not very good with anything else, but there are some other types of textures in here. Nothing in these textures was taken from the internet, they were created purely out of my own personal Photoshop assets and some game assets in Skyrim. They are all game ready, seamless, and were created for those of you modders that are having a hard time getting decent textures for your own mods. I really hope you guys find some use for these and I would love to see what you do with them. If you have any questions, just ask in the comments or send me a message.

Be sure to credit me for my work if you do use any of it.
author: Osmodius
